mapper.delete: UPDATE tb_message_user SET is_delete = CASE WHEN message_show = #{userId} THEN 1 ELSE is_delete END, message_show = CASE WHEN message_show = 0 THEN #{friendId} WHEN message_show = #{userId} THEN 0 ELSE message_show END WHERE ( (send_user_id = #{friendId} AND receive_user_id = #{userId}) OR (send_user_id = #{userId} AND receive_user_id = #{friendId}) ) AND (message_show = 0 OR message_show = #{userId}) AND is_system = 0 AND is_delete = 0;
mapper.select: select id, content, send_time, send_user_id, receive_user_id from tb_message_user where ( (send_user_id = #{friendId} and receive_user_id = #{userId}) or (send_user_id = #{userId} and receive_user_id = #{friendId}) ) and (message_show = 0 or message_show = #{userId}) and is_system = 0 and is_delete = 0;
